description: Try this comforting pumpkin soup with bacon.
name: Pumpkin & Bacon Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot heat the oil and butter. Cook onion over low heat for five minutes.
Add chopped bacon, garlic and ginger. Cook a further 10 minutes stirring occasionally.

Increase the temperature to medium. Add stock, pumpkin and potatoes ( 2cm cubes work well). Salt and pepper. Once it boils stir well. Reduce heat to a simmer. Cover with a lid and simmer for 40 minutes.
Remove from heat. Allow to cook slightly. Blend soup to desired consistency. If too thick add a little extra stock. Serve in a bowl with a drizzle of cream on top.
